code: export function getPrimarySavingsGoal(accounts){const goal=accounts.find(a=>a.type==='savings'&&typeof a.goalTarget==='number');if(!goal||!goal.goalTarget)return null;const pct=Math.min(100,Math.max(0,Math.floor(goal.balance/goal.goalTarget*100)));return{name:goal.name,percent:pct,balance:goal.balance,target:goal.goalTarget};}export function getTotalDebt(accounts){const total=accounts.filter(a=>a.type==='loan'||a.type==='credit_card').reduce((sum,a)=>sum+(a.balance||0),0);return total;}export function inferGoalsFromAccounts(accounts){const out=[];if(accounts.some(a=>a.type==='loan'||a.type==='credit_card'))out.push('pay_down_debt');if(accounts.some(a=>a.type==='savings'))out.push('save_big_goal');if(accounts.some(a=>a.type==='investment'))out.push('start_investing');return out;}
